mapper.select: SELECT t1.customer_name customerName,sale_date saleData, sale_number saleNumber, `state` ,user_id userId,total,t2.sale_list_id saleListId FROM t_customer t1 LEFT JOIN t_sale_list t2 ON t1.customer_id = t2.customer_id LEFT JOIN t_sale_list_goods t3 ON t3.sale_list_id = t2.sale_list_id WHERE `state` = #{state}
